title: Oru Kuchi Oru Kulfi Lyrics Kalakalappu 2
stanzas:
oru kuchi oru gulfi
vandhu ninnu edu selfi.

unkoodathaan photo pudichen
touchu phonula
touchu panni ichu koduppen
honey moon-ula.

thalli thalli pogaathamma
nillu nillu
namma kalyanatha enga
vachikalaam sollu sollu

vandhaa maha lakshmiye
nee vandhathaala overnightula
naanum rajiniye.

yaaru yaaru annaatha
yaaru yaaru
anna nada akkavukku
super star-u.

straighta una paathaa
nee irukura quieta
white-a tubelighta
ne jolikkura brighta

siza chinna vayasa
unna paathen nice-a
ye pala palanu minukuriye
plastic rice-a

karanja kuchi ice-a
kulukkal bumper price-a
biriyani nee irukka
edhukudi pizza

pakkathula ne irunthu
paathukadi maman dhillathaan
megamallu katti vachen
manasukullathaan.

jingiliyaa jinukaa
dhevathaya kanakkaa
nammala pola kappalu
ooril irukkaa
indha ooril irukkaa
namma ooril irukkaa
indha ooril irukkaa

oru kuchi oru gulfi
vandhu ninnu edu selfi.

unkoodathaan photo pudichen
touchu phonula
touchu panni ichu koduppen
honey moon-ula.

thalli thalli pogaathamma
nillu nillu
namma kalyanatha enga
vachikalaam sollu sollu

vandhaa maha lakshmiye
nee vandhathaala overnightula
naanum rajiniye.

oru kuchi oru gulfi
vandhu ninnu edu selfi.

yaaru yaaru annaatha
yaaru yaaru
anna nada akkavukku
super star-u.
